attributes.action: convey to Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam, President of India, the respect, friendship and gratitude of the British people towards the people of India.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
During the second world war, over 2.5 million Indians fought for Britain and her allies - every one was a volunteer.  They came from modern day India, Pakistan and Bangladesh and 87,000 gave their lives in the fighting.

For this debt and the continuing contribution that Indians (and British people of Indian origin) are making to our society, we ask the British Prime Minister to covey our respect, friendship and gratitude to the India President.
